overview: Who was it who ever said that size wasn’t everything? Well, they may have been happy appreciating the average dick, but that’s certainly not the case when it comes to this horny bunch of supercock-crazed dick hounds! Indeed, these lads aren’t happy unless their every orifice is being stretched to the very limit by some of the biggest phalluses on the planet! Kurt Maddox, Sven Laarson and Yuri Adamov lead an all-star, dick-lusty band whose only objective is to take cock-worship to a whole new oversized level! You have been warned!
title: The Bigger the Better
